summary: Implements H.264 codec support for WebRTC, offering classes that encode raw video frames into RTP packets, decode RTP payloads back into raw frames, manage NAL unit fragmentation and aggregation, handle bitrate and frame‑rate constraints, and provide utilities for parsing payload descriptors and packetizing/depacketizing video data.
business_intent: Enable real‑time video communication in WebRTC applications by supplying a full H.264 encoding/decoding pipeline and RTP payload handling, allowing efficient streaming, recording, and processing of video streams.
